Back to [Fan](https://fanwangecon.github.io)'s [Reusable R Code](https://fanwangecon.github.io/R4Econ/) table of content.

# Load Packages and Tibble

```{r}
# Load Tidyverse
library(tidyverse)
# Load Fan's R4Econ Package
library(R4Econ) 
# Load datasets
tb_iris <- as_tibble(iris)
```

# Table Basics

Show what is in the table: 1, column and row names; 2, contents inside table.

```{r}
rownames(tb_iris)
colnames(tb_iris)
colnames(tb_iris)
summary(tb_iris)
```

# R4Econ Function to Summarize All Variables in Table

Use R4Econ's summary tool. 

```{r}
df_summ_stats <- ff_summ_percentiles(tb_iris)
t(df_summ_stats)
```
